name: Mensch-Computer-Interaktion
promptAddition: Combines UX/UI design, interaction principles, and usability testing to create intuitive digital interfaces. Focuses on user behavior, accessibility, and prototyping tools (e.g., Figma, Adobe XD).

name: Full-Stack Development
promptAddition: Covers end-to-end software creation: frontend (HTML/CSS/JavaScript frameworks), backend (APIs, databases), and deployment. Emphasizes agile workflows, version control (Git), and testing.

name: Data-Driven-Media
promptAddition: Applies machine learning, computer vision, and data visualization to automate tasks, analyze media content, or generate insights (e.g., recommendation systems, image recognition).

name: Software Entwicklung
promptAddition: Focuses on scalable architectures, secure coding practices, and system design. Includes DevOps, encryption, and threat modeling for robust applications.

name: Projektmanagment
promptAddition: Bridges technical execution and leadership: pitching ideas, interdisciplinary teamwork, and managing digital projects with lean/agile methods.
